item.title: #vROps Webinar 2016 â€“ Announcing Part 4 : Contention Based Performance & Capacity Management
item.description:
We hope you are having fun with the vROps Webinar Series and learning in the process!

With the next instalment of this series, we have a new speaker who will entertain us ðŸ™‚ He is no stranger to the world of vRealize Operations Manager and has written a couple of books on vROps as well. I am referring to Iwan Rahabok who has been my partner in crime on all the vROps related work which we do, inside VMware or with the community.

item.title: #vROps Webinar 2016 : Part 3 â€“ Capacity Planning De-Mystified!
item.description:
Session Details:-

Capacity Planning Demystified!

Capacity Planning is an integral part of vRealize Operations Manager and through this session we want to de-mystify the concepts of Capacity Planning in vROps using features such as projects and the out-of-box capacity views. We look at defining the capacity planning policies based on the business requirements of an organization

A big thank you to Rawlinson Rivera to provide all the lab equipment required for the live and thanks again to my Co-host Sunny you’re a legend!
